name: Kush Rise
description: Kush Rise by Colorado Seed Inc. is an odoriferous blend of tropical elements like citrus and greenery mixed with the pungent earth and gentle sweetness of quality ocean grown genetics. By combining Hawaiian Sunrise and Rug Burn OG, CO Seed Inc. has crafted a strain with a bright mental alertness coated in calming body buzz. Kush Rise is another fantastic “beach chair bud” from the crew out of Colorado.
descriptionPlain: Kush Rise by Colorado Seed Inc. is an odoriferous blend of tropical elements like citrus and greenery mixed with the pungent earth and gentle sweetness of quality ocean grown genetics. By combining Hawaiian Sunrise and Rug Burn OG, CO Seed Inc. has crafted a strain with a bright mental alertness coated in calming body buzz. Kush Rise is another fantastic “beach chair bud” from the crew out of Colorado.

highlightedReviews.text:
Kush Rise from Helping Hands in Boulder...Thank you for this delight! Got a 1/4th and into the first bowl I was thinking how I need to get more already! The batch I picked up recently was at 23.02% THC with nugs looking so robust n' frosty white that I almost felt bad grinding them. 

I find it good for any time of the day when I just need to slow down a bit without totally compromising my thought process. A little bit goes a long way though, you can get messed up on this. 

Kush Rise also eases and stops my mind from thinking about pain. And man it melts stress and promotes relaxation! Relaxed but not sleepy or couch locking. Highly recommend!
